title: The Realists
body:
Looking for members to play in a ranked team. Don't have to be too great with mechanics, but must understand strategy. 

Guys that can cs, not chase through low vision enemy jungles for kills, know what objectives are, and ward up.
* Not interested in any abc uber yolo 420 swagmen. Some maturity would be nice for a change. 
If you are feeling disillusioned with bronze noobs, this could be the team for you.

IGN: Bookbash

replies.body:
I would be really keen looking for a ranked team willing to improve and can take losses as a lesson.

Im in B5 -_- thanks to provisonals and would really like to make it up the ranks I just have real bad luck with teams I get into.

I pref mid.

Thanks
Blazed Grizzly {{champion:69}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:38}}
Thanks everyone for their interests, we now have a team, and will be hitting the rift shortly :)

>
> Thanks everyone for their interests, we now have a team, and will be hitting the rift shortly :)

Just a quick update, our team started well with 2 wins, and we now have a full roster. Thanks to all that joined!
im in I use curse main jg and mid
il give it a shot ign NightTemplar
